website_summaries.verdict: A desert boot for a lower price.
pros: A great Clarks boot for the price
Comfortable fit and with a high collar
Leather upper provides protection from weather and the tread has decent grip
This boot is also quicker to break in than the classic Desert Boot
Leather or suede comes in a variety of colors
cons: Leather color may wear off quickly

customer_reviews.title: Clarks failed to deliver
customer_reviews.text: My purchase was motivated by a previously owned pair of Clarks Desert Boots with which I was very happy. Right out of the box, the color is very different to that of the picture. Once I laced up the boots and took a few steps, the leather began losing its color wherever there was even the slightest bend. After wearing them for 5 days, they look like a 2 year pair of beater boots. I'm not sure if the dramatic change in color is a feature, rather then a defect, but it does not look good. I would not buy another pair in this specific color and would not recommend that you do either.
customer_reviews.author: Rosendo Morales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casual boots
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots. They show a lot of wear right off the bat, but I get compliments on them constantly and it just changes the look to be more casual. Don't buy these if you're looking for them to stay as pristine as the picture. They fit true to size and after just a week or so they became super comfortable. I bought insoles and generally wear thicker socks, but they did great walking 72 miles around Europe. I wear these boots almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Russted

customer_reviews.title: Great casual/office boot
customer_reviews.text: Originally received a pair as a gift a couple years back in a forest green color. Broke in beautifully. Oversaturated them in the salty snow of NYC and Buffalo. Hit them with some black leather dye, looked (still look) good as new. Bought THIS pair in Beeswax/brown. Fit is spot on, will need some breaking in. I like these even more than the desert boot.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Retro-distressed and casually stylish
customer_reviews.text: Stylish in a retro distressed sort of way. I got several responses to my plea for sizing help (thanks guys), and went one half size smaller than I usually wear. They fit well. These are not boots I'd want to wear for anything serious. For hiking, working, or riding my motorcycle I'll use a different pair. But for casual - stylish occasions they're comfortable and eye catching. I've gotten quite a few compliments. Overall I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wm B

customer_reviews.title: i think i could have gone down a size and still been fine. but i really dig them
customer_reviews.text: i said these fit somewhat large, but they still fit. i think i could have gone down a size and still been fine. but i really dig them. i'll update the review after a few months to see how they hold up. i typically wear my footwear hard, and while these will be more business casual attire for me (not for long walks or anything rigorous), i'm curious how they'll do. i've got high hopes though and think they look fantastic in person.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent casual walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I ordered a size up, as usual for boots. The fit is pretty much perfect. Note that these are not hiking boots. They don't have a hard sole. They don't even have any treads. I chose the suede version. The soft leather requires very little break-in period, something I think is often overlooked about boots. The included laces are crap. These boots will fit better with thicker, stronger laces.
customer_reviews.author: cometlinear

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not great. The leather is very thin and the finish ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are decent for the $50.00 I payed. Seeing them at over $100 is disconcerting. The quality is not great. The leather is very thin and the finish was so ugly I saddle soaped them right out of the box and took it off as best I could. I would suggest finding something else if these are over $50. When I saw $179.00 i lolled
customer_reviews.author: Rorschach

customer_reviews.title: Nice for dress or casual
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking boot that fit my 9.5 just right. Felt comfortable after 3 hrs. Nice sole. Looked even better after putting on boot dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Boot seemed to be of excellent quality in both material and build unfortunately they were ...
customer_reviews.text: Boot seemed to be of excellent quality in both material and build unfortunately they were too small. Kudos to Amazon for free returns. :D
customer_reviews.author: M. Shane LeCroix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boot!
customer_reviews.text: i own three pairs of clarks ... this is my four. the fit is pretty true. quality product. only con would be overall comfort ... it's def not a long distance boot although it breaks in rather quick, but with a decent insert it's fantastic. the style and quality from clarks is always on point. (pictures are after two days of wear - also i put a military lace in mine)
customer_reviews.author: Matt R.

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little large, but I’m guessing the next size down would be tight. Not much shock absorbing going on with the sole, so I’ll likely be adding in insert and that will improve the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: These Clarks fit like all my previous desert boots. That kind of consistency over the years is tremendous. I always wear size 11.5 in any good running shoe. Quality running shoes are always consistent in sizing. I bought these in size 10.5 and they are slightly snug now will break in perfectly. Good thick leather, nice crepe sole.
customer_reviews.author: TFJW3

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic boot...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic boot. Extremely comfortable. I'm a lover of the Clark desert chukka and the high neck on these adds additional comfort. I added a Dr. Sholls insert and can wear these all day every day. One of the best deals on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Willeyez

customer_reviews.title: Good Mid-Range Boots
customer_reviews.text: Like because they work for an office or a trail. Were a bit uncomfortable starting out, but broke in nicely after one use. The leather cracked a bit at the bend point, but it doesn't make the boot look bad.
customer_reviews.author: rb82

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: My experience with Clarks tells me I should order a half size smaller and the same applies here. Very nice looking pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Chan Fong Cheok

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boots and a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boots and a perfect fit. I ordered my normal size and had no problems. I live the way the leather gets a worn look right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I’m a Clark’s fan
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. It takes a couple of weeks to break them in but it’s worth it. I love the way they look too. After the first wear you will see a lot of creases but that is the style of this particular color. That literally look like you had them bronzed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of well-made boots
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend's favorite pair of boots. They scuff for a more vintage look, but beware if you're looking for more of a clean cute style.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, and the sole is a weird poorly painted yellow foam block. Expected much higher quality from the brand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Furr

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot. Runs a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. I had to size down a full size from my running shoe/tennis shoe size. I'm a 13 in those, but a 12 in the Clark's Mali.
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves Clarks shoes, and I found these ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves Clarks shoes, and I found these cheaper on Amazon then in the outlet store. He has worn them non-stop. They fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: they are great, comfortable boots with a great look
customer_reviews.text: Clarks always run large so I went with a much smaller size and they fit perfectly. they are great, comfortable boots with a great look.
customer_reviews.author: David Graubard

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are breaking in really nicely and I’ve only worn them for 4 days. They’ve also been getting a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Fresh Fantastic

customer_reviews.title: This stretches so get the exact sign or half a ...
customer_reviews.text: This stretches so get the exact sign or half a size smaller and wear thick socks to stretch it out.
customer_reviews.author: PhoKing

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews stating that I should downsize at least half a size so I went ahead and ordered a pair in size 9 (I usually wear size 9.5) and they were to small, I had to return them and reorder them in my regular size (9.5) which fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fragoso

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 11 in boots (Cole Haan, J. Varvatos etc) but 10.5 in this boot fit me perfectly. Definitely worth the money and I love wearing these at my standing desk since they provide so much cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Jean d'Angers

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots. Once they are broken in they are comfy. Order a whole size down as they run big!
customer_reviews.author: Maryclayre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. The only problem with them is that the sole is very rubbery and it comes off.
customer_reviews.author: TinoRZA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The red trim gives it a great look and makes it stand out. I love the Clark's Mali' styles. Perfect size, perfect look. Not to busy, and like I said, the red gives it a flavor that shows off how sexy these boots are. I love em.
customer_reviews.author: Sèy’

customer_reviews.title: Crepe sole lasts 2-3 years.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Second pair. Crepe sole tends to last 2-3 years before blowing out. Will return this pair for smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Grade Ten

customer_reviews.title: Good fit overall and very comfortable right out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good fit overall and very comfortable right out of the box, but slightly longer than I was expecting. Just a wee bit, not too much to be a problem. I'm digging these boots so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Clarks. Good looking boot!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great, received them fast too
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel great, received them fast too. Awesome looking boot. Been waiting a long time to get a pair of boots like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would avoid the leather on this shoe unless you like an extremely worn look in a boot
customer_reviews.text: The color did indeed wear off with any added pressure. I would avoid the leather on this shoe unless you like an extremely worn look in a boot. I returned my pair after only trying on the right foot.
customer_reviews.author: Will Stein

customer_reviews.title: product worn out and product damaged
customer_reviews.text: I reaally liked the beewax color, What i got was brownish and worn out (damaged ) shoe..
customer_reviews.author: raman

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are excellent for a causal evening out with friends or a date.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price. The leather is great and distresses nicely. The gum sole also keeps your steps quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: This pair stands out
customer_reviews.text: Break-in period was somewhat painful, the back of my heels got rubbed out. That's all but gone now with good insoles. Crepe soles are new to me - they are minimalist and offer less traction in the snow, a warning. No arch support either, but again nothing that decent insoles couldn't fix. Keep my feet surprisingly warm even with just cotton socks on. In sum, these elevate your style! Like with most boots, you must go at least half a size down for a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: rmrg

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Boot looks great and fits well but the sole wears away fast.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots at a unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Colors are accurate to the photos. I usually wear a 14 in any other shoe but I size down to 13 in clarks because I know they run big and they adjust to your foot a lot. They fit like a glove and look deadly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Long time Clarks' customer, fit as expected, looking forward to the normal compliments and offering referrals. Might not be your first choice if you expect a highly molded internal support. Very light. Previous (similar) Clarks lasted a long time and were well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy E Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: I have a size 10US foot, and as standard with boots, ordered a size down to a size 9. The fit is comfortable, and I enjoy the sole: the green color gives the boot a unique look. I was expecting the shoe to scuff and age slowly, but it is actually SUPER prone to deep scuffing -- I'm unsure if I like this quality of the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I usually wear the chukka boots, but these are a nice alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe just buy half size smaller than your regular fit in a Clarks.
customer_reviews.author: Glenroy G.

customer_reviews.title: I love Clark’s, but these are the worst I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: Low quality leather. I love Clark’s, but these are the worst I’ve had. The leather scratches easily and is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Skurtu

customer_reviews.title: Great look/uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks great... had to buy insoles to wear them... pretty uncomfortable. But after insoles were put in they are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, but appeared extremely worn after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Fit is as expected Leather shows worn marks very easily Wear these everyday
customer_reviews.text: Fit is as expected Leather shows worn marks very easily Wear these everyday, my go to shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: It was a great boots and fits right. Also good price. I am still looking for a color taupe distressed desert boots on Mali style.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: This Shoes are very comfortable. Sole is very smart rubber and leather is ...
customer_reviews.text: This Shoes are very comfortable. Sole is very smart rubber and leather is also very smart. I wear Nike, Adidas, Puma size US 8 but the size 7 is perfect fit to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They fit true to size and are very comfortable. Easy to lace and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Hoots, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing, cool and versatile. High quality leather and rubber sole. Beeswax finishing is awesome and gives the boots a vintage style. Fit perfectly. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Maffe

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and very comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved, loved, loved this boot...said it was very comfortable and the red sole is a nice unusual touch! Very sharp looking on his slim foot.
customer_reviews.author: C. Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: I like the color I received better in all honesty
customer_reviews.text: The boots arrived a deeper, darker red than the picture shows. I like the color I received better in all honesty. I normally wear a 10.5-11 depending on the brand. I read reviews stating they run a bit large, so I went with a 10. Length is perfect, though a slight bit narrow for my foot. Hoping they stretch well.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Benson

customer_reviews.title: Absofreakinlutly awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: Gotta be one of the most comfortable boots I've EVER worn, they replaced a pair of Israeli boots that lasted over 25 years .. It's like walking on air
customer_reviews.author: J. Alan Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Great boots love them
customer_reviews.text: Great boots love them!! I wear 9 US or 42 EU and these shoes seem to run a tad bit big. If you play on wearing them with thinner socks I would recommend sizing down a half size! The come very dark but lighten up the minute the leather bends. Great boot!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: The heels are elevated so it makes it seem like walking in
customer_reviews.text: The heels really hurt. The heels are elevated so it makes it seem like walking in heels
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

product_meta.title: Clarks Men's Desert Mali Boot
product_meta.description:
The leather only gets better with age in this handsome casual boot.

Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
